attributes.action: Addressing High Car Insurance Costs: Urgent Action Needed
attributes.additional_details:
it is crucial to review and reform current insurance regulations that contribute to inflated premiums. For example, the current insurance law in the UK mandates that each car be insured for one person, resulting in increased costs for families with multiple drivers. This not only exacerbates financial strain but also contributes to environmental pollution, congestion, and accidents.

Given the gravity of this issue and its widespread impact on society, I strongly urge the British Parliament to convene at the earliest opportunity to address these urgent matters and implement effective solutions to alleviate the financial burden of car insurance on UK citizens.
Thank you for your attention to this critical matter
attributes.background: to address the significant concern regarding the ongoing high cost of car insurance in the UK. As a citizen and driver, I am deeply troubled by the financial strain imposed on individuals and families due to the soaring premiums for auto insurance

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Hold a Public Inquiry into the increasing cost of car insurance in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660820
